messages.subject: Unsubbing and thank  you
messages.msgSnippet: I am unsubbing from this list.  I am learning much from the death of my aunt.  She got engaged Saturday night and was killed Sunday morning while riding on the
messages.messageBody:
I am unsubbing from this list. I am learning much from the death of my
aunt. She got engaged Saturday night and was killed Sunday morning while
riding on the back of her fiance's motorcycle. I can't continue to spend
the amount of time on the computer that I have been, and my home business is
taking enough computer time as it is. I will likely search for a lower
volume unschooling list in a few months, but for now I need to curl up with
my babies and live and play.

I thank you for the ideas and support both in parenting and unschooling, and
the help with finding words for my cousins' journals. I've learned a lot in
the few months I've been on this list. I look forward to meeting many of
you IRL at the Live and Learn conference this August.

With care,
Kristi



Kristi Hayes

Mamatoto Advocate

GypsyMama.com

Joyful mama to Morgaine, Orion, and Isaac



"There are no great things, only small things with great love. Happy are
those." ~Mother Theresa









[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
